hero.title:
Engineer by craft.
Diver by soul.
Rider by heart.
hero.subtitle: Android • Backend • Systems • Writing • Travel • Scuba • Motorcycles

whatImGoodAt.title: What I'm Good At
whatImGoodAt.description: Building scalable Android applications, designing robust backend systems, and writing code that stands the test of time.

items.title: Mobile Engineering
items.description: Android development with Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, and modern architecture patterns. Focus on performance, accessibility, and user experience.

items.title: Backend Systems
items.description: Scalable APIs, microservices architecture, event-driven systems. Go, Node.js, Kafka, Redis. Systems that handle scale gracefully.

items.title: Systems Thinking
items.description: Architecture that scales, code that's maintainable, solutions that solve real problems. Clean code, clear patterns, thoughtful design.

whatIDontOptimizeFor.title: What I Don't Optimize For
whatIDontOptimizeFor.description: Maturity means knowing what not to chase. Here's what I skip.

items.title: Buzzword Bingo
items.description: I don't chase the latest framework just because it's trending. I choose tools that solve real problems.

items.title: Over-Engineering
items.description: Simple solutions first. Complexity only when necessary. YAGNI isn't just a principle—it's a discipline.

items.title: Velocity Over Quality
items.description: Fast is good, but sustainable is better. I optimize for long-term maintainability, not short-term metrics.

items.title: Solo Heroics
items.description: The best code is written by teams. I focus on collaboration, knowledge sharing, and building systems others can understand.

hiring.title: If You're Hiring
teams: Product-focused teams building real user value
Teams that value code quality and maintainability
Environments that encourage learning and growth
